蹍蹍蹍

蹍字的基本解释

蹍
niǎn
踩，踏：“蹍市人之足，则辞以放骜。”
方言，追赶（亦作“撵”）：他跑得飞快，狗也蹍不上。

蹍字的汉语字典释义

[①]［zhǎn］［niǎn］
［《集韻》知輦切，上，知。］
［《集韻》尼展切，上，泥。］
亦作“1”。
(1)踩，践踏。
(2)履行；实践。
(3)以指按物量长短。引申指距离短。
(4)见“蹍然”。

蹍字的康熙字典解释

【酉集中】【足字部】　蹍； 康熙笔画：17； 页码：页1231第17
【廣韻】知演切【集韻】【韻會】知輦切，?音展。【博雅】履也。【玉篇】足踏貌。【類篇】踐也。【莊子·庚桑楚】蹍市人之足。【音義】蹍，蹈也。【張衡·西京賦】當足見蹍。【註】足所蹈爲蹍。　又【集韻】【正韻】?尼展切，音碾。與趁同。

蹍字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
蹍字的起名意思

暂无。

Xun
Basic explanation of words
Xun
niǎn
Step on, step on: "If you have the feet of the people in the city, then you will let go."
Dialect, chasing (also known as "hunting"): He runs so fast that the dog can't catch it.
Xun
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①] [zhǎn] [niǎn]
["Jiyun" knows and cuts, goes on, knows. ]
["Ji Yun" Ni Zhan cut, upper , mud. ]
Also known as "1".
(1) Step on, trample.
(2) Fulfillment; practice.
(3) To refer to the length of the material. By extension, the distance is short.
(4) See "Xun Ran".
Xun
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
【Unitary Collection】【Foot Character Department】　蹍; Kangxi Strokes: 17; Page Number: Page 1231 Page 17
[Guang Yun] Zhi Yan Qi [Ji Yun] [Rhyme Club] Zhi Yu Qi, sound exhibition. [Bo Ya] Li also. [Jade articles] Footsteps on the appearance. 【Classes】Practice also. [Zhuangzi·Geng Sangchu] The feet of the people of Xunshi. [Sound and meaning] 蹍, dance also. 【Zhang Heng·Xijing Fu】It is enough to see you. [Note] What you are doing is a kick.　[Ji Yun] [Zheng Yun]? Ni Zhan cut, sound grind. Same with taking advantage.
